heading: This Afternoon
text: Sun filtering through periods of high clouds. High temperatures from the mid 70s to around 80, except low to mid 70s far south. Winds variable to southeast at around 5 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Variable clouds, thicker across the south. Very slight chance of a shower near the Massachusetts border. Lows in the low to mid 50s, except mid 40s to around 50 northeast and in the Adirondacks. Winds becoming light, variable to south, except south 5 to 10 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly to mostly sunny. Highs from the upper 70s to mid 80s. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.
